description: Try our easy to follow Mille-Feuille recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mille-Feuille Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cut cooled pastry in half then each half into 3 equal rectangles. Reserve 4 pieces. Top remaining pastry with berries and custard cream. Sandwich 2 of the layers on top of each other and finish with a reserved plain pastry piece. Dust with icing sugar and serve.
